name: Air-O-Space
description:
Note: Download version preferred, but if you play web please DO NOT use fullscreen :)

Air-O-Space

This game is about sorting aliens, diving deep into space and taking even deeper breaths! Take the Blumbles and Grunks from the ship's chute and sort them into their respective bins. But make sure to keep your breathing in rhythm and follow instructions from Captain Von Droop! As you venture deeper into space, your breathing will need to keep up with the crazy events aboard the SS Junk! 

Blumbles (the circles) are worth 10 points.

Grunks (the rectangles) are worth 30 points.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48 - Theme: "Deeper and Deeper."

Controls 

Mouse: Drag/Drop Blumbles & Grunks 

Q-Key: Inhale, when in the left orange zone.

P-Key: Exhale when in the right orange zone 

*Feel free to adjust the volume slider on the title screen.

Credits:

UX and Art: Niki N.

Programmers and Designers: Ryan D. and Hudson SG

Chief Narrative Officer and Sound Design: James T.

AUDIO SOURCES:
